abstract: Florida Panthers defeat Detroit Red Wings, 3-1; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jagr scored his 718th N.H.L. goal, moving into fifth place on the career list, and added an assist in the host Florida Panthers’ 3-1 win over the Detroit Red Wings.

headline.main: Jaromir Jagr Scores 718th Goal as Panthers Win
headline.print_headline: Jagr Scores 718th Goal as Panthers Win

snippet: Jagr scored his 718th N.H.L. goal, moving into fifth place on the career list, and added an assist in the host Florida Panthers’ 3-1 win over the Detroit Red Wings.
